document.discussion_title: Five things you need to know today
document.topic_text: USA TODAY Sports' Rachel Axon tells you the five things to watch for during Day 7 of the Olympics. Recent related news Good morning, Boston, and welcome to another sweltering Wednesday. Whether you're working today, or just looking to catch up on business news from the beach,... bizjournals - Business Also reported by • Irish Times You Might Like
